title: new client and updating
body:
why is it such a hassle to update the new client?
first it warns you that its about to start updating.
then when it does it goes to a different screen.
then after that it says its gotta update something else and comes up with a request box.
and then if you want to use the legacy client you gotta update that as well. I mean seriously. what's the point of making a new client if everything is worse.
